DOC.brief_title: Increasing Treatment Seeking Among Suicidal Veterans Calling Crisis Line
DOC.detailed_description: The goal research plan test effectiveness brief , cognitive behavioral ( CB ) intervention promote behavioral health treatment engagement among at-risk Veterans call Crisis Line resistant behavioral health service . This randomize controlled trial recruit 80 Veterans report current suicidal ideation time Crisis Line call resistant seek behavioral health treatment . Half participant receive brief , individualize CB intervention half receive standardize procedure VA 's Crisis Line ( i.e. , usual care ) . The effectiveness intervention test 1 ) attitude toward behavioral health treatment rate , 2 ) initiation adherence treatment ( assessed number session attend ) . The investigator also assess impact intervention suicidal ideation ( SI ) explore impact common symptom observe Veteran suicide decedent ( e.g. , depression ) .
